title: Real Estate Landing Page
subtitle: How we designed real-estate landing page to showcase home flipping benefits ensuring a professional outlook integrating clear call to action for webinar sign-ups leading to a trusted and engaging experience, driving conversions.

about.name: Real Estate Landing Page
about.desc: Personal landing page for a real estate client Shreaz Ali to educate users about the benefits of home flipping and showcase his experience and achievements.

projectTeam.desc: The project’s design took one week to complete.

projectDetails_1.heading: What was the Problem?
projectDetails_1.desc:
• Client wanted to build a Landing Page for his home flipping real-estate business to help people know about home flipping and how his services can help them.
  • The Landing Page should not sound aggressively salesy as users are likely to avoid engaging with such websites.

projectDetails_1.heading: What were the Goals?
projectDetails_1.desc:
• Design the landing page showcasing the client’s achievements to establish trust and confidence among visitors.
  • Presenting the content as educational and informative way and also motivate them to register for the webinar.
  • Ensuring the design reflects the client’s personality casual yet experienced, showcasing their expertise and proven track record.

projectDetails_1.heading: What was the Solution?
projectDetails_1.desc:
• Highlighted the benefits of flipping homes through content that showcases the client's expertise, building trust with users.
  • Designed intuitive call-to-action buttons that guide users toward simple actions like signing up for a webinar or downloading a guide.
  • Implemented a clean, minimalistic design with a luxurious feel to reflect the client’s personality while ensuring smooth navigation.

projectDetails_2.heading: Behind the Scenes...
projectDetails_2.desc:
Target Audience

  • Individuals aged 50 and above who are interested in real estate, financial growth, or learning about flipping homes.


User Interface Understanding and Inspiration

We analyzed multiple landing pages of websites in similar domain and Analyzed preferences of the target demographic focusing on a design and tone that resonates with their expectations.



Ideation on various sections

We created a wireframe for easy navigation and registration, then refined the hero and other sections based on client feedback to finalize the landing page layout.

projectDetails_2.heading: User Interface and Product Outlook
projectDetails_2.desc: A clean design using colors like yellow, black, and muted white, paired with professional typography using the 'Inter' font, and high-quality images was chosen to create an ultra-luxurious and minimal look for the website.

projectDetails_3.heading: Conclusion
projectDetails_3.desc:
What did we achieve from the project ?

  • Successfully designed the client’s Landing Page showcasing client’s achievement and experience along with webinar details, highlights and benefits.
  • The final design reflects the client’s approachable yet professional personality, creating an engaging experience that encourages webinar registrations while building trust with users.

projectDetails_3.heading: Client Feedback
projectDetails_3.desc:
What did we achieve from the project ?

  • Re-designed the entire realEstate app with a fresh outlook of minimalist and simpler user interface.
  • The new design improves usability and enhances realEstate’s image as a reliable platform for connecting users with contractors and suppliers.
